title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Tamron 90mm f/2.5 SP, ISO 800, f/?, 1 s
text: Have a Niceday.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Tamron 90mm f/2.5 SP, ISO 800, f/?, 1 s
text: Serial terminal.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Tamron 90mm f/2.5 SP + Tamron 2x Teleconverter, ISO 1600, f/?, 1/2 s
text: I really like this pen, it's a TWSBI Vac 700R.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Tamron 90mm f/2.5 SP + Tamron 2x Teleconverter, ISO 1600, f/?, 1/5 s
text: I'm having a very bad week. Anyway, I've had this for a few years now and always liked how it looked. Bit ashamed of the visible dirt here.

title: Canon Powershot G10, ISO 80, f/4, 1/100 s
text: Yeah it seems okay now, bit misty I think but seems fine.

title: Canon Powershot G10, ISO 800, f/2.8, 1/60 s
text: So I damaged this camera today. Uh, well, A bottle of water spilled in my bag all over it. I am writing this on the 28th and it seems to be okay now.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Tamron 90mm f/2.5 SP, ISO 400, f/11, 1/250 s
text: A common green bottle and a bumblebee. I didn't bother getting my tripod setup for this though unfortunately. There was a strong breeze blowing the flowers around. On an unrelated note, day 150, my next goal, is set to be on Thursday it seems. I'll be busy that day with something very important, but I will try and write a post that afternoon. It would be a good idea to anyway, to distract myself.

title: Canon Powershot G10, ISO 80, f/4.5, 1/640 s
text: Lots of seagulls in Margate. Also a crab museum.

title: Canon Powershot G10, ISO 400, f/4.5, 1/100 s
text: There were lots of birds here. We saw a swan building a nest, which we left alone for obvious reasons. I took some photos of it on film, which I hope turned out well.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Tamron 90mm f/2.5 SP, ISO 1600, f/?, 1/125 s
text: Some stuff in my room. I should take better pictures of them some time.

title: Canon Powershot G10, ISO 100, f/4, 1/400 s
text: I haven't had a good week.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Tamron 90mm f/2.5 SP, ISO 1600, f/?, 1/125 s
text: My camera thinks this was taken on the 22nd, but it's just forgotten about BST.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + FujiFilm XF 27mm f/2.8, ISO 200, f/2.8, 1/1000 s
text: Really didn't want to go outside today.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Tamron 90mm f/2.5 SP, ISO 400, f/8, 1/125 s
text: A little experiment I wanted to do. Don't have a good light to use as the one I used for slides isn't diffused enough, so excuse the markings in the background.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Tamron 90mm f/2.5 SP, ISO 400, f/8, 1/125 s
text: Some expired Ektachrome 200 I shot. It's pretty bad, so this photo being bad doesn't mean you're missing out on anything.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + FujiFilm XF 27mm f/2.8, ISO 400, f/16, 1/125 s
text: I really like this photo. We went for a long cycle so I couldn't really be bothered to do anything, which included uploading this.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Tamron 90mm f/2.5 SP, ISO 400, f/16, 1/125 s
text: Not my best, but I still like it.

title: Oneplus 8t...
text: Yeah it's on my phone I know... But I really didn't want to force photography today, seen as I didn't feel like it and doing that would just make it feel like a chore. Also, I wanted to get a picture of this bumblebee here, and I missed it with my camera.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Tamron 90mm f/2.5 SP, ISO 1000, f/?, 1/180 s
text: Behind, again.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Tamron 90mm f/2.5 SP, ISO 800, f/?, 1/180 s
text: I do like these flowers.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Tamron 90mm f/2.5 SP + Tamron 2x Teleconverter, ISO 200, f/?, 1/250 s
text: Very happy with this photo. Wish I'duploaded it on the day so it didn't get buried like this...

title: Canon Powershot G10, ISO 100, f/4, 1/800 s
text: Was testing the 17mm lens today.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Tamron 90mm f/2.5 SP, ISO 800, f/?, 1/250 s
text: Missed focus on most photos today unfortunately.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Konica Hexanon AR 40mm f/1.8, ISO 200, f/11, 1/180 s
text: I really liked the colours in the garden this evening.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Konica Hexanon AR 40mm f/1.8, ISO 500, f/8, 1/60 s
text: Not much to say about this one.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Helios 44-2 f/2.0, ISO 200, f/?, 1/1000 s
text: I think this is a honey bee, but I'm bad at identifying insects.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Tamron 17mm f/3.5 SP, ISO 200, f/16, 1/60 s
text: Yeah this lens is pretty soft, but I like it. I still think it'll be better on the Canon A-1.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Tamron 17mm f/3.5 SP, ISO 500, f/11, 1/250 s
text: A new lens arrived while I was away. It's mainly intended for my Canon A-1, but I might as well try it adapted to this camera. I feel it'll definitely be a lot better on the Canon though.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + FujiFilm XF 14mm f/2.8, ISO 200, f/16, 1/250 s
text: I love the view from this hill, it's just unfortunate we only found it on the last day. We also shot a roll of aerocolour in 120 and I hope to be able to share that at some point. At least we got amazing weather while we were up there!

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + FujiFilm XF 14mm f/2.8, ISO 200, f/8, 1/30 s
text: A rare sunset on the east coast of England.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Canon FD 75-200mm f/4.5, ISO 800, f/?, 1/500 s
text: This is why I got this lens out! They didn't turn out too well, but the seals are adorable anyway! One of them is smiling!
